entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.36.4 more bug fixes!
entry.content:
More merge pdf bug fixes and various other bug fixes!

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: Rename LANGS variable in init.sh to avoid clashing with LANGS env by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2468
  • Fix img to pdf merge conversion type by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2476
  • Fix drag and drop bugs and clean up UI by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2466

Enhancements

  • Remove Direct Logger and Use Lombok @Slf4j by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2480

Minor Enhancements

  • Bump googleJavaFormat from 1.22.0 to 1.25.2 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2481
  • Fix draggableElement is null by removing draggable.js by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2485

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2483

Other Changes

  • Bump io.github.pixee:java-security-toolkit from 1.2.0 to 1.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2471
  • Bump org.springframework.security:spring-security-saml2-service-provider from 6.4.1 to 6.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2474
  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.14.1 to 1.14.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2469
  • Bump org.springframework:spring-webmvc from 6.2.0 to 6.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2472
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2482

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.36.3...v0.36.4

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.36.5 image to PDF bug fixes and more!
entry.content:
Lots more bug fixes and improvements

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: form data not being sent in multi by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2492
  • Img to pdf bug fixes by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2493
  • Remove file input append by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2497
  • [Bugfix] A variety of tools miss PDFLib by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2501

Minor Enhancements

  • Exclude Sensitive and Error-Prone Fields from toString() in SAML2 Conâ€¦ by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2498
  • Config mount check by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2500
  • Fix: Draw image with the original PDF page dimensions by @omar-ahmed42 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2503
  • Un-hide image to pdf from navbar by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2505

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2499

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.36.4...v0.36.5

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.36.6 Improved signature functionality and drag-and-drop bug fixes
entry.content:
Improved signature functionality and file drag-and-drop bug fixes

We also now sign our docker images for easy verification for anyone that needs that :)

What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Update .pre-commit-config.yaml by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2525
  • Fix file drag and drop by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2575

Enhancements

  • Update and improve zh_TW Traditional Chinese locale by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2513
  • Standardize Alpine base image format and version across all Dockerfiles by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2540
  • Feature/improved signature element by @reecebrowne in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2489

Minor Enhancements

  • standardize the submit button by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2509
  • formattingand autowired constructors by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2557
  • Fixes SSO login rejection by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2566

Docker Updates

  • Bump gradle from 8.11-jdk17 to 8.12-jdk17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2517
  • Docker labels by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2536

Translation Changes

  • Adding the missing translations in French by @crownbackend in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2563
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2579
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2582
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2583

Other Changes

  • remove redundant entries by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2507
  • Bump springBootVersion from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2522
  • Bump io.spring.dependency-management from 1.1.6 to 1.1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2523
  • Bump org.springframework.boot from 3.4.0 to 3.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2524
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2526
  • [Security] Dangerous-Workflow by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2532
  • used pre-commit/action by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2548
  • rollback check_properties.yml by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2551
  • Fix: duplicated mapping key by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2550
  • extends the .gitignore for cert and ssh by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2572
  • Bump gradle from 8.11-jdk17 to 8.12-jdk17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2556

New Contributors

  • @step-security-bot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2516
  • @crownbackend made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/2563

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.36.5...v0.36.6
